component.name: Sonixd
component.summary: A full-featured Subsonic/Jellyfin compatible desktop music player

description.p: Sonixd is a cross-platform desktop client built for Subsonic-API (and Jellyfin in 0.8.0+) compatible music servers. This project was inspired by the many existing clients, but aimed to address a few key issues including scalability, library management, and user experience.
